pages.title: Cursed Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of the hostile mobs that roam the Overworld. List of valid mobs: Creepers, Guardians, Phantoms, Skeletons, Slimes, Spiders, Strays, Witches and Zombies.
Complete the Catalyst by absorbing the correct souls, until the process is finished and the Catalyst appears.

When used in a Runic Artifact, a Cursed Catalyst produces Cursed Materia. Cursed Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into general mob loot such as Rotten Flesh and Arrows, or more exotic stuff like Prismarine Shards and Nautilus Shells.
